Frequently Asked Questions

What is the distinction between an estimate and a design contract?

{An estimate|A quotation|A pricing evaluation} is a {free estimate|complimentary estimation|cost assessment} that is {prepared|created|crafted} for your project. When you {finish|complete|conclude} a {large remodeling|extensive renovation|major refurbishment}, the price is for the {entire job|whole project|complete work}. The cost of the project may {change|vary|fluctuate} as you {progress|move forward|advance} through the {design phase|planning stage|design process}.

A {design agreement|design contract|design arrangement} indicates that you have chosen {Roberts General Contractors|our company|our team} as your {builder|construction team|building contractor} but are {unsure|indecisive|not certain} of the {design|architectural design|construction plan} you wish to build. The agreement is {only for|solely for|exclusively for} the {design portion|design phase|design aspect}, so you can {agree on|finalize|settle on} the design and {final project pricing|ultimate project cost|conclusive project pricing} before {signing a contract|committing to a contract|entering into a contract} for the {entire contract amount|complete project value|total contract sum}.

Click Here to call us now (206) 804-4523

What should I expect from the project?

{We will|We’ll|We shall} {build|construct|create} a {full|comprehensive|complete} contact and production timeline with you {after|following|once} discussing your ideas. {We want to know|We are interested in learning|We’re eager to understand} what your {project goals|objectives|project aims} are, {what concerns you have|your concerns|the issues you’re facing} about it, and {where your budget is set|your budget constraints|the allocated budget}. {We’ll|We will|We shall} {keep you updated|provide regular updates|keep you informed} {every step of the way|at each stage|at every phase} once we {start working|commence the project|initiate the work}.

How does the Home Improvement Consumer Protection Act handle emergency work?

{Any work|Any task|Any job} conducted under {the emergency work requirements|the prerequisites for emergency work|the conditions for emergency projects} of {Section 201-7|Section 201-7 of the law|Section 201-7 in the legislation} of Pennsylvania’s Unfair Trade Practices and Consumer Protection Law is {not considered|not regarded as|not categorized as} a home improvement under {the Home Improvement Consumer Protection Act|the HICPA|the Consumer Protection Act for Home Improvement}. This page contains {a link|a reference|a hyperlink} to that statute.
